movies.title: The Island of Secrets
movies.plot: What was supposed to be an ordinary holiday on Kos turns into an adventure for the 3 boys when the local girl Adriana is kidnapped.
movies.simplePlot: What was supposed to be an ordinary holiday on Kos turns into an adventure for the 3 boys when the local girl Adriana is kidnapped.

biography.bio: Nuutti Konttinen is an actor, known for The Island of Secrets (2014), Changes (2014) and Ihan sama (2014).
biography.name: Nuutti Konttinen

biography.bio: Emil Auno is an actor, known for The Island of Secrets (2014).
biography.name: Emil Auno

biography.bio: Veikka Vainikka is an actor, known for The Island of Secrets (2014) and Roba (2012).
biography.name: Veikka Vainikka

biography.bio: Ifigeneia Tzola is an actress, known for The Island of Secrets (2014), The Mating Game (1999) and The Island (2010).
biography.name: Ifigeneia Tzola

biography.bio: Ville Myllyrinne was born on July 14, 1973 in Vantaa, Finland as Ville Tapani Myllyrinne. He is an actor and writer, known for Ketonen & Myllyrinne (2006), Koistiset lennossa (2012) and Miss Zahra (2015). He is married to Anu Hakkarainen. They have one child.
biography.name: Ville Myllyrinne

biography.bio: Laura Malmivaara was born on October 26, 1973 in Kajaani, Finland as Laura Pauliina Malmivaara. She is known for her work on Kotikatu (1995), Vares: Private Eye (2004) and Les instables (2000). She was previously married to Aku Louhimies.
biography.name: Laura Malmivaara

biography.bio: Joanna Triantafyllidou was born on October 18, 1985 in Thessaloniki, Greece. She is an actress, known for The Island of Secrets (2014), Min arhizeis ti mourmoura (2013) and Amore Mio (2015).
biography.name: Joanna Triantafyllidou

biography.bio: Orfeas Avgoustidis is an actor and director, known for Loufa kai parallagi: Seirines sti steria (2011), Okniria (2002) and Loafing and Camouflage: Sirens in the Aegean (2005).
biography.name: Orfeas Avgoustidis

biography.bio: Yannis Zouganelis was born on February 3, 1956 in Patissia, Athens, Greece as Ioannis Zouganelis. He is known for his work on Que ces dames attendent (1998), Here We Are! (2004) and Peinandeous (1986). He is married to Isidora Sideri. They have one child.
biography.name: Yannis Zouganelis

biography.bio: Natalia Dragoumi is an actress, known for I exafanisi (2008), Testosterone (2004) and Jafar (2011).
biography.name: Natalia Dragoumi

biography.bio: Yannis was born in 1974, in Greece. Evros, near borders with Turkey is the place in which he grown up. He studied in Giorgos Kimoulis Modern Theatre of Athens Drama School, when he was 23. For few years he moved out New York, until he returned in his country. He has a remarkable career in theater, TV and movies.
biography.name: Yannis Stankoglou

biography.bio: Efi Papatheodorou is an actress, known for Sto para 5 (2005), The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants (2005) and The Winter (2013).
biography.name: Efi Papatheodorou

biography.bio: Gerasimos Skiadaressis was born in 1960 in Patra, Greece. He is an actor, known for Captain Corelli's Mandolin (2001), From the Snow (1993) and Valkanizater (1997). He has been married to Bessy Malfa since 1997. They have three children.
biography.name: Gerasimos Skiadaressis

biography.bio: Panos Kranidiotis is an actor, known for Dream II (1992), As Long As There's Alcohol... (2002) and Mia istoria (1988).
biography.name: Panos Kranidiotis

biography.bio: Born in Athens, he studied English Literature in Athens, Acting at the Carolos Koun Drama Theater School in Athens and Film Direction at the New York Film Academy on scholarships from the Fulbright Foundation, the Onassis Foundation and the Greek Film Centre. While in New York, he worked as an actor and assistant director under Robert Wilson at the Watermill Center (2000) and went on to perform in Wilson's production of Prometheus at the Megaron Athens Concert Hall (2001). On his return to Greece, he acted and directed in a number of Greek theaters, played various roles on Greek TV and founded the Ithikon Akmeotaton production company, directing Albert Camus' Caligula (2000), Antoine de Saint Exupery's The Little Prince (2003) and two plays by Marius von Mayenburg-The Ugly One (2008) and The Dog, the Night and the Knife (2009)-for the stage. He also served a scriptwriting internship in Berlin in 2007 as part of the Nipkow Programm, during which he participated in the Berlinale Talent Campus at the 57th Berlin International Film Festival. "The American" by Alexandros Papadiamantis Thanassis Sarantos has adapted, acted and directed the novel "The American" by the prestigious Greek writer Alexandros Papadiamantis and toured it in many cities and islands of Greece. (2009-2011) "The American" was also presented in Michalis Kakogiannis Foundation in January and March of 2011. Athens and Epidaurus Festival 2011 - Alexandros Papadiamantis and "A Dream on the wave" In July of 2011, Thanassis Sarantos adapted, acted and directed another story written by Alexandros Papadiamantis: that was the "A Dream on the wave" ("Oneiro sto kyma"), one of the cultural events of Athens and Epidaurus Festival 2011. This play was dedicated to the writer's memory
biography.name: Thanassis Sarantos
